author: timbeiko
content:
On today's AllCoreDevs, we discussed having a retrospective about Pectra and the hard fork process more broadly. 

As a first step, I created an EthMagicians thread to aggregate reflections from client teams and the community ðŸ§™

https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/pectra-retrospective/22637

If you have strong opinions about the process, that's the time and place to raise them and be heard! 

As Petra wraps up, we'll go through this and figure out what we can improve before diving into Fusaka ðŸ«¡
